Shaun Sweeney

Based in London, UK

About Me

Welcome!

I’m 24 years old and I have recently graduated with a Masters degree in Energy Systems Engineering from University College Dublin, Ireland. I also have a Bachelors degree in Electrical & Electronic Engineering. I made this website in order to display my experiences in a personalised way and in order to learn some new software skills. On this website you will find details of the things that I am good at, my achievements, my work experience and a few comments from some people I have worked with in the past.

To get to know me a bit better, here is a list of things that I can do/I am interested in:

Energy systems, power systems
Connected, electrical transport systems
Coding, software
Statistics, data science, machine learning
Project and team leadership
Goal setting and achievement
Attention to detail
Communicate effectively
Maths
Smart cities, smart grids, economics
Entrepreneurship, start-ups
Control theory and optimisation

Mar 10, 2016

People I've worked with

Shaun is an incredibly capable and hard working guy. While at ElectroRoute, he completed some outlandishly complex projects, going above and beyond what could be expected of him. He was a key asset and he also happens to be a really nice guy.

Shaun joined my team as an intern just before I hired 8 full time employees to build the EMEA operations center. Shaun learned fast, asked the right questions, pointed to & solved problems quickly and was in a position where he really was leading organisational change. He was in charge of numerous process and productivity improvement projects which he completed with an exceptionally high attention to detail. We have invited him back whenever he is free to work with us.

Since co-founding Gondolaa in May 2016, Shaun has shown an incredible attention to detail, the ability to filter and translate important information nodes into actionable tasks, the ability to identify and subsequently eliminate potential bottlenecks in planning and executing tasks and strategy, as well as absolutely accurate allocation of essential resources for efficient collaboration. Shaun features an integer, easy-going and admirable personality.
